product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Dermo Cleanser and Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Dermo Cleanser and Makeup Remover moisturizes the skin as it gently removes waterproof makeup and removes dirt and oil on face and eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsMilky cleanser gently cleanses without over-dryingKey IngredientsGlycerin: helps prevent over-dryingLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water: helps soothe the skinFormulated WithoutFragrancePreservativesParabensItem 2620408How To UseStep 1: Apply with fingertips or on cotton ball, massaging in a gentle, circular motion.Step 2: Rinse if not using cotton ball to remove.Step 3: Finish up with a mist of La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring WaterIngredientsWater/Aqua, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Capryl Glycol/Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply with fingertips or on cotton ball, massaging in a gentle, circular motion.Step 2: Rinse if not using cotton ball to remove.Step 3: Finish up with a mist of La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water

reviews.headline: Won't Remove Mascara
reviews.comments: I typically love La Roche Posay products, but this was a failure. I had been using a clear liquid from La Roche Posay that was the bomb, but it seems to have been discontinued. This works better on a cotton pad, but even so, it leaves a lot of makeup residue even with washing afterwards.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin. I use this product to wash my face in the morning and as step two of double cleanse at night

reviews.headline: This did nothing except irritate my skin
reviews.comments: This didn't cleanse my skin, or moisturize it. It left a strange film and only irritated my skin, when I was trying to heal my moisture barrier. I love LRP but this was not it.

reviews.headline: So good for excema!
reviews.comments: I only used it once and normally wouldnt leave a review after one use. But wowâ€¦its amazing!! I have VERY excema/ psoriasis prone skin and my skin always felt dry and cracked after i washed it. To the point that my face hurt as soon as it dried. After one use my skin was glowing and smooth!! My face started to feel better immediately when i applied this product. No cracked/dry feeling anymore. All excema people should try!

reviews.headline: NOT a makeup remover!
reviews.comments:
This does not remove makeup easliy. I washed my face and it felt like a greasy residue was on my skin. I washed my eye makeup well, rised and when I looked up my face was covered in smeared black mascara! Even foundation residue was left on my face. I had to use a different face wash to get my face clean. 
Maybe it works for a no makeup girl but not for me. They need to stop calling this a makeup remover!!

reviews.headline: love this hydrating gentle cleanser!
reviews.comments: I really like this cleanser. My face feels so soft and hydrated after, that I could really go without moisturizer! I don't wear makeup so not sure how it removes mascara.. and I wish it came in a big bottle with a pump for this price.

reviews.headline: amazing product
reviews.comments: I have finally found my cleanser. Such a great product I was shocked at how well it removed my eye makeup because of how many reviewers said it didn't. I wet my face first to loosen the mascara and then I rubbed some on my eyes. I barely use foundation or other makeup on my skin so this product met my needs. It doesn't dry your skin or irritate it. I have super sensitive skin and most cleansers are too drying for me. If you wear makeup daily I'd suggest their stronger cleanser. If your someone who rarely uses makeup then this cleanser is for you.

reviews.headline: Staple Product~~!
reviews.comments:
I love to use the Toleraine Dermo-Cleanser when my combination skin is irritated, dry, or if I'm just in a hurry.  I also love the variety of ways it can be used:  as a regular cleanser, as a moisturizing mask-- rub it into your skin and let it sit for 20-30 minutes before wiping or cleansing it off, and if you run out of moisturizer or just need something a little heavier you can use it as a moisturizer after wiping off the excess!  

It doesn't do so well for removing makeup, but it loosens face and eye makeup before you go to wash your face and remove your eye makeup.  Or if you have on light eye makeup, it WILL remove it.  This stuff is just absolutely a staple in my skincare.

reviews.headline: Very gentle
reviews.comments: This is truly gentle but it does not remove makeup or rinse clean. It is best used with a washcloth and a gentle toner after to remove residue.

reviews.headline: Great for irritable skin
reviews.comments: Very gentle yet removes makeup very well. Have extremely irritable skin around the eyes and this doesn't irritate it. Removes eye makeup well but I still use an additional product for waterproof mascara

reviews.headline: Soothing
reviews.comments:
This is the single best face wash I've ever stumbled upon. I switched from Cetaphil to this. While Cetaphil was cheaper and fairly gentle, it could still be irritating and contained parabens. 

This product is silky smooth and leaves my face feeling calmed and soft. It is a godsend to sensitive skin. I also use it for eye make-up removal.

reviews.headline: Great Cleanser
reviews.comments:
I have aging, changing skin and thought I would try this about 6 months ago. My skin was breaking out so I decided to change my whole skin care routine.  I began with this cleanser, then added the thermal spring water, Redermic C eyes and Redermic C UV during the day and Redermic R at night.  What a difference in my skin.  I no longer break out, don't have any redness or dry patches.  

Some have commented that it doesn't remove make-up, specifically eye make-up.  I use a little dab to remove my eye make-up first and gently pat off with a tissue.  Then, I use a dime-sized amount to cleanse my face.  I then rinse off with water. Works fine for me.

reviews.headline: Great Cleanser
reviews.comments: This is a great cleanser for sensitive and combination skin. Removes some makeup but not all. It does not remove eye makeup well, need to use additinal eye makeup remover. Overall a good cleanser, leaves skin soft and not dry skin.

reviews.headline: Gentlest product
reviews.comments: This is my new favorite skin wash. It is so gentle and effective. My skin is super soft and clear. I have very sensitive skin and it is hard to find products that are fragrance free and oil free. I also wanted something without parabens. You can rinse it off (rinses easily) or leave in.

reviews.headline: Cleanser
reviews.comments: Takes a little getting use to not using water to remove.

media.headline: Fantastic
media.caption: My products I use over the years

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have aging, changing skin and thought I would try this about 6 months ago. My skin was breaking out so I decided to change my whole skin care routine.  I began with this cleanser, then added the thermal spring water, Redermic C eyes and Redermic C UV during the day and Redermic R at night.  What a difference in my skin.  I no longer break out, don't have any redness or dry patches.  

Some have commented that it doesn't remove make-up, specifically eye make-up.  I use a little dab to remove my eye make-up first and gently pat off with a tissue.  Then, I use a dime-sized amount to cleanse my face.  I then rinse off with water. Works fine for me.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Cleanser

faceoff_negative.comments: This is supposed to be a cleanser that you don't have to rinse. That doesn't seem like it would do a good job of cleansing, and I really didn't like using it as a cleanser. My skin did not feel clean after using, especially if I didn't rinse. However, I did like using it as a barrier on my skin. It does not moisturize, at least not as far as I could tell, but put on already moisturized, dried, skin it seemed to act as a good moisture barrier. When used in this way, I noticed that my face didn't get drier in certain situations where it normally does. Honestly, I don't think it's worth it to buy a whole product just for that one thing. I'd rather just put on extra moisturizer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Bad Cleanser, Okay Barrier

rollup.name: Toleriane Dermo Cleanser and Makeup Remover
